_comment_general: This is an example credentials file. Replace all values with your actual credentials.
_comment_gpt: Your OpenAI API key from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
_comment_meta_token: Your Meta WhatsApp Business API access token from Meta Developer Console
_comment_phone_id: Your WhatsApp Business phone number ID from Meta Business Manager
_comment_whatsapp_account: Your WhatsApp Business account ID from Meta Business Manager
_comment_phone_display: Your WhatsApp Business phone number (display format with + prefix)
_comment_app_id: Your Meta app ID from Meta Developer Console
_comment_webhook: Your custom webhook verification token (you set this yourself)
_comment_io_sheet: Google Sheets ID for transaction input/output (from the URL of your Google Sheet)
_comment_summary_sheet: Google Sheets ID for summary/reports (from the URL of your Google Sheet)
_comment_users: User configuration - Phone numbers in Meta format (without + prefix) for proper user recognition
